last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 17
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gong Sil is acting different since returning to Korea and Joong Won is not happy about it.

name: Master's Sun
overview: Joo Joong-won is the arrogant, greedy CEO of Kingdom, a  conglomerate that includes a supermall and a hotel. "Ghost whisperer”  Tae Gong-shil, is a misunderstood outcast who can't keep a  boyfriend or a job since a near death experience left her seeing needy  ghosts. She feels compelled to help them resolve their earthly issues so  they can move on to the afterlife... and he feels compelled to think  she's crazy. Soon their lives merge into a complicated web of hijinx,  misunderstandings, and... yes, love.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Joo Joong Won is the CEO of Kingdom  Enterprise, and he's only interested in two things: his money and  himself. But then he meets Tae Gong Shil, a woman with the ability to  see ghosts. Needless to say, they get off to a very rocky start.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A rumor circulates that the fountain inside of Kingdom's mall is haunted by a female ghost.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Gong Sil finds a shoe that belongs to the dead wife of one of the shop owners in Kingdom.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Joong Won agrees to let Gong Sil stay close to him; meanwhile another ghost has shown up at Kingdom Mall.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A ghost matchmaker warns Gong Sil to be wary of ghosts who might want to use her to return to the living.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As Gong Sil gets closer to Kang Woo, she worries that he'll distance himself if he finds out that she can see ghosts.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Secretary Kim gets a cold, Gong Sil has to step in as Joong Won's secretary for the day.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Joong Won finds out the real reason Kang Woo began to work for him.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Joong Won saves Gong Sil when a piantist's dead wife takes over her body.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Gong Sil warns Joong Won's aunt that an evil spirit is lurking in Joong Won's engagement present.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Gong Sill meets the ghost of Giant Mall's chairman while attending his funeral with Joong Won.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Gong Sil meets the ghost of a missing child whose mother is desperately searching for him.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Gong Sil asks the ghost matchmaker to help her find a way to save Joong Won.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Gong Sil starts her new job helping the ghost matchmaker, meanwhile Secretary Kim is back in Korea.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Gong Sil meets someone from her past, meanwhile Yi Ryung finally gets her dinner date with Kang Woo.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The child ghost, Woo Jin, reappears and begs Gong Sil to save his mother.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Gong Sil is acting different since returning to Korea and Joong Won is not happy about it.
